scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-data
scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); const files = fs.readdirSync(src); files.forEach(file => { const srcPath = path.join(src, file); const destPath = path.join(dest, file); if (fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } }); } copyDir('data', 'docs/data');"
scripts.copy-data-dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); const files = fs.readdirSync(src); files.forEach(file => { const srcPath = path.join(src, file); const destPath = path.join(dest, file); if (fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } }); } copyDir('data', 'public/data');"
scripts.sync-data: cd scripts/data-sync && npm install && node fetch-data.js
scripts.sync-data-aws: cd scripts/data-sync && npm install && node fetch-data-aws.js
scripts.sync-data-discord: cd scripts/data-sync && npm install && node fetch-data-discord.js
scripts.generate-discord-joueurs: cd scripts/data-sync && node generate-discord-joueurs.js && cd ../.. && npm run copy-data-dev
scripts.generate-achievements: cd scripts/data-sync && node generate-achievements.js && cd ../.. && npm run copy-data-dev
